text: anzlnah ealayk -ayha alrswl- lthdhr bih qwmana lm yundhar abawuhum min qblk, wahum alerb, fhwla' alqawm sahun ean al'iiman walastqamt ealaa aleamal alsalh. wakulu 'umat ynqte eanha al'iindhar taqae fi alghflt, wafi hdha dalil ealaa wjwb aldaewat waltdhkyr ealaa aleulama' biallah wshreh; l'iyqaz almuslimin min ghflthm
